Name: Christa
Text: Seriously, Barney. You gotta watch the Captain. He scares me.

Name: Barney
Text: Jeez, I know, Christa.. But he's really into that... stuff.

Name: Christa
Text: Hang in there. We'll be right back to help you.

Name: Barney
Text: You sound like I'm the one going on a dangerous mission, ha ha ha!
